titleStmt.title: The Roman empress a tragedy : acted at the Royal Theater, by His Majesties servants / and written by William Joyner, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Joyner, William, 1622-1706.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for Henry Herringman ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Supposed to be the story of Constantine the Great and his son Crispus.
